about_the_game:
You were an ordinary person living in the 21st century. That was until you woke up in this new world.

The people here are strange. They seem almost like zombies.
Judging by their abandoned homes, it appears not much time has passed since they lived here.

Are you the savior of this world? No.
With no special powers, you must survive solely for yourself.

  • Dead, too dead is a sandbox zombie survival game set in a fantasy world.
  • Hundreds of zombies move in hordes, equipped with intricate visual and auditory systems.
  • Discover rare magic in the now-ownerless abandoned magic towers.
  • Craft essential supplies and equipment for survival, and build homes to settle down.

You were an ordinary person living in the 21st century. That was until you woke up in this new world.

The people here are strange. They seem almost like zombies.
Judging by their abandoned homes, it appears not much time has passed since they lived here.

Are you the savior of this world? No.
With no special powers, you must survive solely for yourself.

  • Dead, too dead is a sandbox zombie survival game set in a fantasy world.
  • Hundreds of zombies move in hordes, equipped with intricate visual and auditory systems.
  • Discover rare magic in the now-ownerless abandoned magic towers.

name: Dead, too dead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64x
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4-core / AMD Ryzen 3 4-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K or AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Dead, too dead is an open-world survival game where an ordinary person from the 21st century is summoned to a fantasy world on the brink of apocalypse. Use any means necessary to survive in this world. Just remember one thing: you are not a legend. You are just an ordinary person.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
